english.segment1: - verse 1 -. if i can say just one thing, let it be Your name Lord. if i can hear just one voice
english.segment2: - chorus -. let it be Yours. let Your holiness pour from my lips. may my thoughts be inhabited Lord. let Your glory fall over me. let it be Yours.
english.segment3: - verse 2 -. if i can sing just one song, let it be in Your Name Lord. And when i need strength in weakness, Ill call on Your name,
english.segment5: - bridge -. oh Lord, teach me to die to myself, so all that is left is You. oh Youlet me eat and breathe on Your Word
